<h1 align="center">
  Where COVID-19 Matters
</h1>

<p>
This application allows you to enter multiple zips and returns COVID-19 statistics, links to state COVID-19 websites, and if available where to get COVID-19 testing. Find out COVID-19 facts where it matters to you, whether for travel or to keep abreast of information for family living across the United States.
</p>

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
